hero_notes: Metamorph (Major) Elasticity - At the beginning of each turn, spend a free action and select one of the forms below:
Enhanced Senses - +2D on perception checks to spot hidden, invisible, or obscured characters, team gains +1 Re-roll on initiative checks.

hero_archetype_list.description: Your versatile body makes you the Swiss-Army knife of supers! You might possess stretching powers, elastic skin, shape-shifting powers, adaptive nanites, or something else, but no matter what, you can get the job done.

hero_major_power_list.description: You possess ultimate control over your body. You are elastic and malleable! You can will this form to stretch at your whim.
notes: Metamorph (Major) Elasticity - At the beginning of each turn, spend a free action and select one of the forms below:

hero_minor_power_list.description: You possess heightened physical and/or psionic senses that allow you to ignore environmental conditions like darkness.
notes: Enhanced Senses - +2D on perception checks to spot hidden, invisible, or obscured characters, team gains +1 Re-roll on initiative checks.
